importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The date when Biden completed his course of radiation therapy, marking a significant milestone in his cancer treatment journey.
The date when Biden's office confirmed the diagnosis of aggressive prostate cancer that had spread to his bones.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The period during which Biden began treatment, including radiation therapy and pill regimen, following diagnosis of aggressive prostate cancer.

keyTakeAways: Former President Joe Biden completed a full course of radiation therapy for prostate cancer, which had spread to his bones.
Biden was diagnosed with an aggressive form of prostate cancer in May 2025, which had metastasized to his bones.
He began a pill regimen earlier in 2025 and underwent Mohs surgery for skin cancer earlier in the year.
Biden's daughter, Ashley, shared a video and photo celebrating the completion of radiation therapy, expressing gratitude to Penn Medicine staff.
The former president remains publicly active, with upcoming public appearances including a speech at the Edward M. Kennedy Institute in Boston and an event for the Nebraska Democratic Party in Omaha.
Biden expressed confidence in overcoming the illness, stating that the cancer had not penetrated vital organs and that his bones were strong.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Former President Joe Biden has completed a full course of radiation therapy as part of his treatment for aggressive prostate cancer that had spread to his bones. He began a pill regimen earlier in the year and previously underwent Mohs surgery for skin cancer. His daughter, Ashley, shared a video and photo celebrating the completion of treatment, expressing gratitude to medical staff at Penn Medicine Radiation Oncology in Philadelphia. Despite his illness, Biden remains publicly active, with scheduled appearances including a speech at the Edward M. Kennedy Institute and an event for the Nebraska Democratic Party. He expressed confidence in overcoming the disease, noting that the cancer had not penetrated vital organs and that his bones were strong.
title: Biden completes a course of radiation therapy for cancer treatment
